{"step_by_step_thinking": "According to the documents, there are several types of Spinal Muscular Atrophy (SMA). The traditional classification includes types 1-4, which are based on the age of onset and severity of symptoms. However, there are also other forms of SMA, such as X-linked spinal muscular atrophy, distal spinal muscular atrophy, and spinal muscular atrophy with lower extremity predominance. Therefore, there are indeed other types of SMA beyond types 1-4.", "answer_choice": "A"}
